text: Fausto Paolo Sozzini, also known as Faustus Socinus or Faust Socyn, was an Italian theologian and founder of the school of Christian thought known as Socinianism and the main theologian of the Minor Reformed Church of Poland. Category:1539 births Category:1604 deaths Category:Italian theologians Category:Nontrinitarianism Category:People from Siena Category:Protestant Reformation Category:Unitarians
title: Fausto Sozzini
